nodes.text: Myrgaanti Shi-Iki was a Gorvan Horansi member of the Rebel Alliance's SpecForce Infiltrators. He and his longtime friend and fellow Infiltrator Bryce Agoris deserted the Rebellion shortly before the Battle of Endor, taking over two million credits of matériel with them, including the prototype of the Koensayr VGK-3 Shooting Star. Shi-Iki became wanted by New Republic Chief of Intelligence General Airen Cracken.
